(viewable impressions)An ad that meets the criteria of being visible in the browser window for a continous 1 second.
(video views) Total number of views we got on our video
(View Watch 2s)The total number of impressions that meet the qualifying video view criteria of at least 2 seconds of consecutive watch time or a swipe up action on the Top Snap
(video watched 6s)The total number of impressions that meet the qualifying video view criteria of at least 6 seconds of consecutive watch time or a swipe up action on the Top Snap

(avg screen time)The average number of seconds spent watching your ad across all paid impressions. Screen time starts recording as soon as the media is fully rendered on the device and the autoplay video starts.
(total_page_view)The total number of times a user has viewed an ad in your app or website.
(story opens) Number of times a Snapchatter taps on the Story Ad in the Discover Feed.
Clickthrough rate (clicks ÷ impressions = CTR)
Cost it will take to reach a certain desired goal and/or objective.
(story open rate)The rate at which Snapchatters tap on the tile. (Story Opens / Story Impressions) * 100.
(cost per story open) The average cost of each Story Open.
(CRM Confirmed) The total number of orders confirmed by CRM.
(avg sales per confirm)The Average number of sales per confirmed CRM's.
total register sales
avg sales order
(CRM cancelled) The total number of orders cancelled by CRM.
(CRM sendback) The total number of Repeated orders in CRM.

(logis delivered)The total number of orders delivered by CRM team.
(logis cancelled)The total number of orders cancelled by CRM team.
(sale_price) the Total Sale Price

(total sales) the Total Sale within the country
(product cost)The Cost Of Product
(delivery cost)The Cost Of Delivery
(CRM confirmed percentage)CRM Confirmed % ((CRM Confirmed * 100 ) ÷ Total Order)
(CRM cancelled percentage)CRM Cancelled % ((CRM Cancelled * 100) ÷ Total Order
CRM sendback in percentage
Difference of CRM
(logis delivered percentage)Total number of orders delivered by logistics team * 100  ÷ Total orders confirmed by CRM
(logis cancelled percentage)Total number of orders cancelled by logistics team * 100  ÷ Total orders confirmed by CRM
(Total number of orders delivered orders ÷ total orders) * 100
(total expense) Product Cost + Ad cost + delivery cost
(profit_and_loss)Total Sales - Total Expense
(profit percentage)(Total sales - total expense) ÷ Total sales

Delivery cost in percentage
Ad cost in percentage

(NEW USERS) The total number of new user we got for a certain period of time
(user engagement)The total number of user engaging with our platform
Group of user interactions with your website that take place within a given time frame
(engaged sessions) The number of sessions that lasted 10 seconds or longer, or had 1 or more conversion events or 2 or more page or screen views.
(page view) The total number of page views divided by the total number of visits during the same timeframe
(engagement rate)The number of interactions divided by actual reach and multiplied by 100.

(viewable impressions) An ad that meets the criteria of being visible in the browser window for a continous 1 second.
(video views) Total number of views we got on our video
(video watched 2s) The total number of impressions that meet the qualifying video view criteria of at least 2 seconds of consecutive watch time or a swipe up action on the Top Snap
(video watched 2s) The total number of impressions that meet the qualifying video view criteria of at least 6 seconds of consecutive watch time or a swipe up action on the Top Snap

(avg screen time)The average number of seconds spent watching your ad across all paid impressions. Screen time starts recording as soon as the media is fully rendered on the device and the autoplay video starts.
(story_opens) Number of times a Snapchatter taps on the Story Ad in the Discover Feed.
Clickthrough rate (clicks ÷ impressions = CTR)
Cost it will take to reach a certain desired goal and/or objective.
(story open rate) The rate at which Snapchatters tap on the tile. (Story Opens / Story Impressions) * 100.
(cost per story open) The average cost of each Story Open.
(crm_confirmed)The total number of orders confirmed by CRM.
(avg_sales_per_confirm) The Average number of sales per confirmed CRM's.

(crm_confirmed_percentage) = CRM Confirmed % ((CRM Confirmed * 100 ) ÷ Total Order)
(crm_cancelled_percentage) = CRM Cancelled % ((CRM Cancelled * 100) ÷ Total Order
CRM sendback in percentage
Difference of CRM
(logis_delivered_percentage) = Total number of orders delivered by logistics team * 100  ÷ Total orders confirmed by CRM
(logis_cancelled_percentage) = Total number of orders cancelled by logistics team * 100  ÷ Total orders confirmed by CRM
(final percentage)=(Total number of orders delivered orders ÷ total orders) * 100
(total expense) = Product Cost + Ad cost + delivery cost
(profit andloss) = Total Sales - Total Expense
(profit percentage)=(Total sales - total expense) ÷ Total sales

Group of user interactions with your website that take place within a given time frame
(engaged_sessions) The number of sessions that lasted 10 seconds or longer, or had 1 or more conversion events or 2 or more page or screen views.
(page view) The total number of page views divided by the total number of visits during the same timeframe
(engagement rate) The number of interactions divided by actual reach and multiplied by 100.
